name: God Of Death
description:
Wake up to a call from the depths of darkness! "God Of Death" invites you to a breathtaking roguelike adventure that will test your speed and reflexes. You'll face waves of enemies arriving in a set amount of time and try to survive. As you pass each wave, you must collect the loot that falls from the enemies and use this loot to strengthen your inventory. Be careful when upgrading your weapons; you can have a superior power by combining similar types and levels of weapons. Think strategically when deciding which weapon to choose and manage your inventory in the most effective way. As the clock ticks down, grow stronger against your enemies and fight to survive! Show how resilient and skilful a warrior you are. "God Of Death", are you ready to write the legend of heroes?

God Of Death is a game where you are under intense enemy attack and try to survive by constantly improving your weapons and skills.



Game features
  • Automatic firing weapons that you can also target manually
  • Short games (each mission/level takes less than 30 minutes)
  • Dozens of item and weapon options (flamethrowers, submachine guns, rocket launchers or options such as swords and sticks)
  • Survive waves lasting between 20 and 90 seconds each and kill as many enemies as you can
  • Gather materials and gain experience and buy items from the shop between attacks
  • Accessibility options: customize the difficulty by changing enemies' hit points, damage dealt and speed
